Master Subclassing / Dual Class Rean:

Repeated rebirth dual class After rebirth You will get a special cloak. To activate you need Adena.
During re-rebirth removes all abilities, character level drops to 85th, reset all skills. There are no restrictions on the choice of class. Thus it is impossible to get a force equal to the level of the main class. (After repeated rebirth will be issued a standard set of skills appropriate third profession Human.)
